title: Race Highlights | 2021 Bahrain Grand Prix
author: FORMULA 1
description:
What a way to kick-start the 2021 season! Watch all the best bits from an enthralling race under the lights of Bahrain.

For more F1® videos, visit http://www.Formula1.com
